Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

GC (Maze).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

HC (Rock Wall).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

HC (Storms Grotto).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that walking backwards is very fast.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: The single rupee is a unique item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the Development branch may be unstable.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Here's a hint, @. Don't be bad.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

ToT (Left).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the stick is mightier than the sword.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

ZF (Fairy).text: I'll make you eat those words.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.
